title: Set $$f(x)=0$$
text: To find the x-intercept, let $$f(x)=0$$ and and solve for x.

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: Solve for $$f(x)=x^2+5x+6=0$$. We can factor it as $$\left(x+3\right) \left(x+2\right)$$.

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: $$\left(x+3\right) \left(x+2\right)=0$$ Use zero product property, we know $$x+3=0$$ or $$x+2=0$$ which gives the answer $$x=-3$$ or $$x=-2$$.

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: We know that $$y=0$$ in x-intercepts and we get $$x=-3$$, -2 through the calculations above. Put together, we get two x-intercepts-- (-3,0) and (-2,0).
